title: Plat 4 Support LF Plat ADC
body:
Plenty of experience with Janna, Soraka, Rakan, Bard and Lulu. Various Mages within the support role are also my wildcards, however I am looking for a dedicated ADC main who wants to climb and learn how to play WITH each other, not assuming it's his or her own lane. 

Specs.

Time Zone - Australia +10 aest
Communication - Pref Skype 
Play frequency - Plays quite often

I'm looking to maintain a couple of games a day around 8:00pm +10. 

IGN: Watch me Feed
You can add me in-game to chat, or message here. Though not 100% on replying here unlike ingame.
